title: How to Make Waffle Cones

steps.headline: Combine the sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract in a large bowl.
steps.description: Use a manual or handheld electric beater until the mixture is creamy. Slowly pour in the melted butter and mix thoroughly.

steps.headline: Get a separate medium bowl.
steps.description: Mix the flour, salt, and cinnamon together.

steps.headline: Add the dry ingredients slowly to the wet ingredient bowl and mix until well combined.
Use non-stick cooking spray onto a pizzelle iron or a non-stick pan.
steps.description: Heat up the iron or pan until it's warm.

steps.headline: Add about 1 1/2 tablespoon of the batter onto the iron.
steps.description: Cook and remove when it's brown and cooked.

steps.headline: Roll the hot and finished waffle around a cone-shaped mold.
steps.description: Seal off the point and any lines together. The waffle will harden as it cools down, so make sure earlier.

steps.headline: Remove the cone from the mold.
Cook the remaining batter and create the cones.
